website_summaries.verdict: Asics relies more on muscle than finesse with the Gel FujiAttack 5. That being said, this Asics trail running shoe still lacked a few essential protection schemes that trail enthusiasts would dearly love to have. However, it does have a really good quality that never fails to impress runners. It brings luxurious comfort when training on the trail.
pros: The Gel FujiAttack 5 is a very durable trail shoe based on the reviews of many runners
A good number of runners really liked the support the FujiAttack 5 delivers
Cushioning is plush in this shoe with the SpEVA, Solyte, and Gel Cushioning System combined
The protective components in this model are limited, but they effectively shield the foot from debris and other hazards
The Asics FujiAttack 5 moves the runner from the doorstep to the trail quite well
Traction is provided by a compound that uses more natural rubber than the more solid form, resulting in a more responsive outsole unit
cons: The price for a pair of the FujiAttack 5 is slightly expensive
It has a moderately heavy weight
A couple of runners wished for more trail protection features since it has a fairly high price, like an anti-debris upper or a reinforced toe cap

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the ASICS Fuji series of trail shoes for several years now, but they seem to be hard to find these days and I do hope that ASICS are not stopping making them. Thank goodness I found these on Amazon in my size. They are lower-profile than road shoes, have a good tread pattern, enough cushioning, a precise fit, and are great for low fell, trail or multi terrain running.
customer_reviews.author: S. FREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Decent price, but not a great trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely not buy this shoe again. Two pairs (the first was sent back for a fault) both tore to the left of the big toe despite me having a normal foot and gait. Also, the shoe is too heavy in the wrong places. The shoe should have more reinforcement at the front and ball and less on the sides. I wear many Asics shoes for road running but am not impressed with their trail shoes. Finally, the laces easily come undone.
customer_reviews.author: mtrojanuk

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrower than normal Asics.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but found them narrower than most Asics trainers. Was going to send them back but the wife decided they fitted her perfectly but she does have narrower feet.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: love asics shoes, my size 10 nimbus 16s fit perfectly, but these were small and narrow in comparison
customer_reviews.author: CraigR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a standard size 10 in all shoes and they fit as expected - firm fit (not tight). They keep my feet secure for the all terrain all weather training i use them for. The tread is a standard pattern that works very well allowing me to make sudden changes in direction without losing grip
customer_reviews.author: Stuart R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe just what I wanted for my park run ...
customer_reviews.text: Good Shoe just what I wanted for my park run on Saturday morning now the weather is changing from warm and dry to wet and cold :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer81

customer_reviews.title: Very happy as usual.
customer_reviews.text: I use the same shoes since almost 2 years. I am very with them for jogging and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: And excellent seller, very fast time delivery and satisfying
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I wanted . And excellent seller , very fast time delivery and satisfying . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable training shoes. I have been using them on paths and trails around the Chilterns, so I was very disappointed that after just over six months they started to show heavy signs of wear. This surprised me as I have only been running around 30 to 35 miles per week. I expected to show this wear after at least 12 months as they are not used on hard terrain only muddy trails and paths! I have therefore stopped using the ASICS Gel-Fujiattack 5 Trail Running Shoes, and use Inovs instead that I have been using for fell running.
customer_reviews.author: JohnS

customer_reviews.title: I got some New Balance for half the price and find them more comfortable and just as stable
customer_reviews.text: Too hard on the feet with the steel bar down the middle. Other, comfier options available. I got some New Balance for half the price and find them more comfortable and just as stable.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking/jogging shoes, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I just had a problem with the first delivery. One shoe had a manufacturing defect (see photo). Few days later I got a new pair of shoes and this time everything was great. Anyway, I had to go to the Post Office to send the first shoes back. The first shoes were 1 star because useless, the second pair of shoes 5 stars and since I can give only one review for both shoes I give 3 stars. Too much troubles for buying just a pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Werner

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-FujiAttack 5 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The gel-fuji attack 5 is a low profile trail shoe ideal for neutral foot types. This shoe features an aggressive outsole pattern and forefoot rock protection plate, making it ideal for various types of trail use. A midfoot trusstic provides extra support while a rearfoot gel unit serves to absorb shock whilst trail running.
feature_bullets: Trusstic System - Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
SpEVA Midsole Material - Improves bounce-back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
Solyte Midsole Material - A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA. Also enhances cushioning and durability.
NC Rubber Outsole - A compound containing more natural rubber content than traditional solid rubber, resulting in enhanced traction on court systems.
3M Reflective - To keep you safe and visible in low-light conditions.
